creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: three pieced dark lining; upper part has applique scrolled pattern on red background surrounding two squares, approximately 3", white, green, pink and black; lower has similar scroll applique on red surrounding large floral applique with two birds in lower corners; narrow multicolored tape border with wide green border
title: Baby Carrier
